title: LP

embed.description: HoboBacon12 / Bronze 3 18LP / 32W 31L Win Ratio 51% / Ashe - 10W 12L Win Ratio 45%, Caitlyn - 10W 8L Win Ratio 56%, Xayah - 8W 1L Win Ratio 89%, Jhin - 2W 1L Win Ratio 67%, Sivir - 0W 3L Win Ratio 0%

body: I have been losing more LP when I lose than when I win and am just confused why.

replies.body: The amount of LP that you win and loss isn't static. It's more of a reflection of how well you did based on how well the matchmaking system thinks you should have done. For example: if the system thinks you will lose and you win, you gain more LP than normal for doing so well. Vice Verse: if the system thinks you should win and you end up losing, you lose a greater than normal amount.
